title: Disconnect from Game 7/9/2017
body:
Twice in the past three weeks, I have had a disconnect from the game and restarting the client makes the game think I never was playing in the game I disconnected from. 

There is no chance to restart the game.

There is no LP lost, and no Leaver Buster.

replies.body: Hmmmmm if the client doesn't give you the option to reconnect and you never see penalties like LPQ or LP losses, it's pretty likely that those games are actually crashing entirely for everyone in the match. I know it's happened a few times in the past weeks for you, but they're normally pretty rare and you won't ever get punished for "leaving" those games that crash.

That's good to hear for myself and the teams I left behind! 

Hopefully we can figure out what is causing these!
